results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..floor(n/2)} lcm(1,...,2(n-k)+2)/lcm(1,...,2k+2).
comment: Diagonal sums of number triangle A120101.
link: Muniru A Asiru, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
program: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=0, n\2, lcm([1..2*(n-k)+2])/lcm([1..2*k+2])); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 04 2019
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jun 09 2006
